meta.title: Button Toolbar
meta.description: Group a series of <b-button-group> and/or <b-input-group> together on a single line, with optional keyboard navigation.

props.description: Make the toolbar span the maximum available width, by increasing spacing between the button groups, input groups and dropdowns
When set, enabled keyboard navigation mode for the toolbar. Do not set this prop when the toolbar has inputs

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the button toolbar
